title: Poove Poove Lyrics Singam Puli Songs Lyrics
stanzas:
[  Poo ........
Poove poove poove
Bodhai yetrum poove
Pavam paaru poove
Unna parthadhum kanna kattudhey
Yedho seigiraai kradhagi
Minnal polave ennul paaikirai
ushnam aagiren naanadi
] (2 times)

Uzhagam muzhudhum parandhu
Iravum  pagalum azhaindhu
Thaedi parthaen unnai pol
Azhagi illayayee...

Uzhavu thuraiyaai nuzhaindu
Unadhu udalil irundhu
Pudhidhu pudhidhai pudhayal
Eduka aasayee...

Ilai pola unnudal penne,
Parimaara vendum ennai.
Devi prasadham ena thinben,
Un padham patta mannai .
Azhagil vizhundhen vizhundhen nan nan nan

Unna parthadhum kanna kattudhey
Yedho seigiraai kradhagi
Minnal polave ennul paaikirai
ushnam aagiren naanadi

Poo ........
Poove poove poove
Bodhai yetrum poove
Pavam paaru poove

Unarvai thoondum udhadu
Urasi parka udhavu
Thirakum ilamai kadhavu
vasamullaye ...

Idayil azhagaai valaivu
Mele parthen nilavu
Rasithu mudikum varaiyil
Porumai illaye ..

Oru parvai veesinal podhum,
uyir theeyil vendhidadha ..
Nee podum vadayin vaasam
Oru motcham thandhidadha ..
Undala kadala thozhaidhen nan nan nan ..

Unna parthadhum kanna kattudhey
Yedho seigiraai kradhagi
Minnal polave ennul paaikirai
ushnam aagiren naanadi ...
